wikipedia_page.main: Fionna Gibb is a British diplomat. She joined the Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) in 1990 and served as Her Majesty’s Ambassador to the Republic of Belarus from 2016 until 2019.  She was Deputy Consul-General in Basra from 2008-2009 and was Deputy Head of Mission in Sana’a from 2010-2012.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Belarus

response: In 2018, Perkins underwent an intensive Russian language course. She was announced as the new UK Ambassador to Belarus and the successor to Fionna Gibb in June 2019, and took up her post in August.
